publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1602.1 Mike Rumbles: Scotland’s Marine Environment—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1602) in the name of Richard Lochhead, insert at end "believes that Scotland should have responsibility out to 200 nautical miles as part of the Scottish zone for marine spatial planning, fisheries and marine nature conservation including the network of marine protected areas, and calls on the Scottish Government to work constructively with the UK Government to reach agreement on this."
